wikipedia_page.main: Tom Stephenson (born 5 May 1992) is an English rugby union player who plays for Rosslyn Park in National League 1.

response: Thomas or Tom Stephenson may refer to:
* Tom Stephenson (activist) (1893–1987), British journalist and walkers' rights activist
* Tom Stephenson (rugby union) (born 1994), English rugby union player
* Tom Stephenson (trade unionist) (1895–1962), English trade unionist

It was announced, on 30 May 2017, that Collins and fellow Saints teammate Tom Stephenson would travel to Australia for the summer to develop their rugby before returning for the start of the 2017/18 Aviva Premiership season.

Marshall began his rugby career at Moulton College, where the likes of his Northampton Saints teammates Howard Packman, Tom Collins and Tom Stephenson also graduated, and progressed to become a full-time Saint in the 2013/14 season.
